planet.name: K2-138 g
planet.description: The K2-138 system is a planetary system that has been discovered by citizen scientists participating in the Exoplanet Explorers project on the Zooniverse platform. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Hardegree-Ullman et al. 2021 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
